name: Sonic Rivals 2
description:
Move your feet or be defeated in an all-new race with 8 rivals, 12 new courses, and unlimited speed. Battle your friends in 6 multiplayer modes or leisurely explore the courses via free play mode. To stay ahead of the pack, upgrade your favorite Rival with 150 new cards. On your mark, get set, spin.
